name: World's Shortest Flight: Papa Westray to Westray Full Flight
description:
The shortest flight in the world - from Papa Westray to Westray, onboard Loganair BN Islander G-BPCA operating flight LM729 on 29 October 2017.

The worlds shortest flight is just 2 minutes long, and today we did it in just 80 seconds!

**Every moment of the flight included from terminal to terminal,**

BECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSMY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo

Flight: LM729
Aircraft: Britten-Norman BN-2 Islander G-BPCA
From: Papa Westray (PPW)
To: Westray (WRY)
